class.name: LegendreParametricTest

javadoc.text: Test of the {@link LegendreRuleFactory}. * This parameterized test extends the standard test for Gaussian quadrature * rule, where each monomial is tested in turn. * Parametrization allows to test automatically 0, 1, ... , {@link #MAX_NUM_POINTS}quadrature rules.
The highest order quadrature rule to be tested.
Creates a new instance of this test, with the specified number of nodes * for the Gauss-Legendre quadrature rule.
javadoc.param: maxDegree Maximum degree of monomials to be tested.
numUlps Value of the maximum relative error (in ulps).

javadoc.text: Returns the collection of parameters to be passed to the constructor of * this class. * Gauss-Legendre quadrature rules of order 1, ..., {@link #MAX_NUM_POINTS}will be constructed.
javadoc.return: the collection of parameters for this parameterized test.
